text:
Kourtney Kardashian's relationship with Younes Bendjima is heating up!

The 38-year-old model took to Instagram on Friday, sharing a steamy photo of herself posing on top of her handsome beau.

In the pic, Kourtney and a shirtless Younes both rock a pair of distressed jeans. The mother of three wore her hair down, pairing the pants with a sexy Calvin Klein sports bra and matching panties.

"#mycalvins," she captioned it, adding that it was an ad for the apparel line.

The photo looks nearly identical to the way Kourtney's youngest sister, Kylie Jenner, and her ex-boyfriend, Tyga, posed in November 2016, for an intimate photo shoot ahead of his birthday. Although the two have since broken up (Kylie has moved on with rapper Travis Scott, who fathered her first child, Stormi), there's no denying that these pics are seemingly the inspiration behind Kourtney and Younes' latest snapshot.

Instagram

The risqué pic comes just a few days after Kourtney and Younes went on a road trip together. The brunette beauty shared some highlights from their trip to her Instagram Stories, including pics of the 24-year-old model skipping through the woods and lounging in a treehouse.
